subject: [Mhln] dreamweaver cs3
body:
Flattery is a form of hatred.

A true knight is fuller of bravery in the midst, than in the beginning of danger.

A man of genius is privileged only as far as he is genius. His dullness is as insupportable as any other dullness.

Shouda, coulda, and woulda won't get it done.

Religion is as effectually destroyed by bigotry as by indifference.

Love and pity and wish well to every soul in the world dwell in love, and then you dwell in God.

Keep true to the dreams of your youth.

In Beverly Hills... they don't throw their garbage away. They make it into television shows.

Be bold-and mighty forces will come to your aid.

Men are rich only as they give. He who gives great service gets great rewards.

Every fool finds a greater one to admire them.

Everyone is always in favor of general economy and particular expenditure.

Why should the devil have all the good tunes?
